snippet: The Center for Brain, Biology and Behavior, opening in Memorial Stadium, is putting the finishing touches on a device that can instantly determine if a concussion was sustained.
lead_paragraph: The Center for Brain, Biology and Behavior, opening in Memorial Stadium, is putting the finishing touches on a device that can instantly determine if a concussion was sustained.

headline.main: At Nebraska’s Stadium, Researchers Will Take Aim at Making Sports Safer
headline.print_headline: Inside Nebraska’s Football Stadium, Researchers Will Take Aim at Making Sports Safer
